p: Three neurotropic flaviviruses documented in horses suffering from meningoencephalitis are enzootic in Europe, West Nile virus (WNV), tick-borne encephalitis virus (TBEV) and Louping ill virus (LIV). Flaviviruses can be divided into three distinct groups according to their vectors: tick-borne viruses, mosquito-borne viruses and viruses with unknown vectors [ 111].
